QueryResult.text: SELECT HIER2.GROUP_ID PROJECT_GROUP_ID, SEC_GROUPS.ID ID, SEC_GROUPS.GROUP_NAME, SEC_GROUPS.LANGUAGE_CODE FROM CMN_SEC_GROUPS_V SEC_GROUPS, CMN_SEC_GROUP_HIERARCHIES HIER1, CMN_SEC_GROUP_HIERARCHIES HIER2, CLB_PROJECT_GROUP_KEYS PROJECT WHERE PROJECT.PROJECT_GROUPS_GROUP_ID = HIER2.PARENT_GROUP_ID AND HIER2.GROUP_ID = HIER1.PARENT_GROUP_ID AND HIER1.GROUP_ID = SEC_GROUPS.ID
